casebody.data:
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION
v.
STAGECOACH VILLAGE, a North Carolina Non-Profit Corporation. No. 529P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Hilda Burnett-Baker, John F. Oates, James Stanley, Jr., Assistant Attorney Generals, for Dept. of Transportation. Shannon R. Joseph, Raleigh, Jeffrey K. Peraldo, Greensboro, for Stagecoach Village.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 9th day of January 2006 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th day of April 2006."
